description: Comprehensive UI Design Specification for SpurTalk - An Anti-Guilt Project Management Application

NavigationHeader.description: Top navigation bar with app logo, navigation links, and user menu

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN user is logged in, WHEN header renders, THEN all nav links are visible and clickable
GIVEN user clicks logo, WHEN navigation occurs, THEN redirect to dashboard
GIVEN header, WHEN inspected, THEN no red or stark white colors present
GIVEN keyboard user, WHEN using tab navigation, THEN all items accessible in logical order

FooterGarden.description: Persistent footer showing mini garden view accessible from all screens

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN user on any page, WHEN footer renders, THEN garden preview is visible
GIVEN user clicks expand, WHEN animation completes, THEN full garden view opens
GIVEN screen reader, WHEN reading garden, THEN alt text describes progress

NotificationToast.description: Non-intrusive notification system using encouraging language

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN task completion, WHEN toast appears, THEN uses celebratory language
GIVEN any notification, WHEN inspected, THEN no red colors used
GIVEN attention needed, WHEN toast shown, THEN uses sand500 (not red)
GIVEN loading state, WHEN 5+ seconds, THEN encouraging message appears
GIVEN AI processing, WHEN loading, THEN progress feedback shown

LoginPage.description: Welcoming login page with minimal friction

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN valid credentials, WHEN submit clicked, THEN redirect to dashboard within 2 seconds
GIVEN invalid credentials, WHEN submit clicked, THEN gentle error message shown (no 'Failed' word)
GIVEN login form, WHEN rendered, THEN all inputs have proper ARIA labels
GIVEN keyboard navigation, WHEN tabbing, THEN logical focus order maintained
GIVEN page load, WHEN rendered, THEN no stark white backgrounds

RegisterPage.description: Encouraging registration with minimal required fields

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN valid registration, WHEN submitted, THEN account created and redirect to onboarding
GIVEN password mismatch, WHEN submitted, THEN friendly error without 'Failed' language
GIVEN form, WHEN inspected, THEN uses psychological safety colors only

MainDashboard.description: Central hub showing one primary action with calming overview

hero.description: Single primary action card - reduces decision paralysis

elements.example: Good morning! Ready for a small step?

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN dashboard, WHEN rendered, THEN shows only ONE primary task (not a list)
GIVEN 2-min button clicked, WHEN timer starts, THEN visual countdown begins
GIVEN mood selected, WHEN tasks filter, THEN matching tasks prioritized
GIVEN dashboard load, WHEN timed, THEN renders within 2 seconds
GIVEN user returns, WHEN dashboard shows, THEN context from last session displayed

DeckPage.description: Card-based task interface showing one task at a time with swipe interactions

cardStack.description: Tinder-style card stack with depth visualization

elements.content: Swipe right to start • Left for later • Down to break down

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN deck page, WHEN rendered, THEN shows exactly one top card
GIVEN swipe right, WHEN animation completes, THEN focus mode activates
GIVEN swipe left, WHEN completed, THEN card moves to bottom of deck
GIVEN swipe down, WHEN completed, THEN nano-step unblocker modal appears
GIVEN swipe animation, WHEN measured, THEN maintains 60fps
GIVEN keyboard user, WHEN using controls, THEN all swipe actions available via buttons
GIVEN touch target, WHEN measured, THEN minimum 44x44pt size

FocusPage.description: Full-screen immersive focus mode with cinema-style dimming

main.description: Single task or nano-step display with minimal distractions

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN focus mode, WHEN activated, THEN screen dims with spotlight on task
GIVEN nano-steps, WHEN displayed, THEN shows one step at a time (cinema mode)
GIVEN 'Done' clicked, WHEN completing, THEN celebratory animation plays
GIVEN 'I'm stuck' clicked, WHEN activated, THEN unblocker generates nano-steps
GIVEN 2-min timer, WHEN complete, THEN gentle prompt: 'Keep going?' or 'Great job!'
GIVEN user stops at 2 min, WHEN choosing 'Done', THEN celebration (no guilt)

TimelinePage.description: Vertical flowing timeline with progressive blur for future tasks

timeline.description: Flowing vertical timeline with visual hierarchy

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN timeline, WHEN rendered, THEN immediate tasks are clear (no blur)
GIVEN future tasks, WHEN rendered, THEN progressively blurred based on distance
GIVEN missed deadline, WHEN displayed, THEN uses sand color (NOT red)
GIVEN high-stress period detected, WHEN timeline generates, THEN buffer days inserted
GIVEN dependencies, WHEN rendering, THEN prerequisite tasks appear before dependents
GIVEN timeline, WHEN inspected, THEN no 'Overdue' or 'Late' labels present

GardenPage.description: Full garden visualization showing all completed task achievements

gardenView.description: Interactive SVG/Canvas garden with persistent elements

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN tiny task completed, WHEN garden updates, THEN new flower appears
GIVEN big task completed, WHEN garden updates, THEN new tree appears
GIVEN streak maintained, WHEN garden renders, THEN sun brightness increases
GIVEN garden elements, WHEN session ends, THEN persist permanently
GIVEN screen reader, WHEN navigating garden, THEN alt text for all elements
GIVEN garden hover, WHEN over element, THEN task details shown

DocumentsPage.description: Document upload and parsing interface for automatic task extraction

elements.label: Drop files here or click to upload

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN PDF upload, WHEN parsed, THEN tasks extracted and displayed
GIVEN image upload, WHEN OCR completes, THEN text extracted and tasks suggested
GIVEN voice note, WHEN transcribed, THEN tasks extracted from speech
GIVEN processing, WHEN >5 seconds, THEN progress feedback shown
GIVEN extracted tasks, WHEN user edits, THEN changes preserved
GIVEN high-stress dates detected, WHEN timeline suggests, THEN buffer days included
GIVEN stall timeout changed, WHEN saved, THEN setting persists across sessions
GIVEN export data clicked, WHEN processed, THEN downloadable file provided
GIVEN high contrast enabled, WHEN UI renders, THEN 4.5:1 contrast minimum
GIVEN font size changed, WHEN applied, THEN all text scales proportionally
GIVEN delete account, WHEN confirmed, THEN data removed within 30 days

elements.content: Simple plans to support your journey.

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN pricing page, WHEN viewed, THEN clear distinction between Free and Premium tiers
GIVEN upgrade clicked, WHEN processed, THEN secure payment provider (Stripe/PayPal) interface appears
GIVEN premium user, WHEN viewing pricing, THEN current plan clearly marked
GIVEN billing history, WHEN requested, THEN downloadable history available

TaskCard.description: Core task display card with effort indicators and emotional context

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN task data, WHEN card renders, THEN all metadata displayed correctly
GIVEN fuzzy deadline, WHEN displayed, THEN shows 'Soon' not actual date
GIVEN card, WHEN inspected, THEN no red or stark white colors
GIVEN screen reader, WHEN reading card, THEN all info accessible

NanoStepList.description: List of micro-steps with completion indicators

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN nano-steps, WHEN first step shown, THEN <2 min and zero effort
GIVEN cinema mode, WHEN active, THEN shows only one step with spotlight
GIVEN step completed, WHEN checked, THEN celebratory micro-animation

UnblockerModal.description: Modal for I'm Stuck / break down task flow

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN 'I'm stuck' clicked, WHEN modal opens, THEN unblocker activates
GIVEN task > 24hr active, WHEN timeout triggers, THEN unblocker auto-activates
GIVEN decomposition, WHEN complete, THEN 3-5 nano-steps generated
GIVEN first step, WHEN displayed, THEN requires <2 min, zero emotional effort

TwoMinuteTimer.description: The 2-minute start timer with gentle completion prompts

completionPrompt.message: 2 minutes done! What would you like to do?

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN button clicked, WHEN timer starts, THEN visual countdown begins
GIVEN 2 min elapsed, WHEN complete, THEN gentle prompt appears
GIVEN user stops at 2 min, WHEN choosing 'Done', THEN celebration (no guilt)
GIVEN user chooses 'Keep going', WHEN continuing, THEN timer continues upward

ProgressBar.description: Visual progress indicator with dopamine-triggering animations

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN progress increment, WHEN bar fills, THEN satisfying animation plays
GIVEN 100% progress, WHEN complete, THEN celebration animation triggers

AchievementBadge.description: Achievement badges for patterns and milestones

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN achievement unlocked, WHEN badge appears, THEN satisfying animation plays
GIVEN locked badge, WHEN displayed, THEN shows muted preview

EmergencyModeCard.description: Emergency deadline mode activation and interface

elements.content: What's actually due? What can wait?

elements.question: What could prevent this next time?

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN emergency clicked, WHEN activated, THEN rapid triage interface appears
GIVEN pomodoro running, WHEN break due, THEN break enforced
GIVEN crisis ended, WHEN deactivated, THEN reflection prompt shown

SubscriptionModal.description: Gentle upgrade prompt when hitting free tier limits

content.title: Unlock more possibilities
content.message: You've reached the free limit for this month. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited AI insights and document support.

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN limit reached, WHEN action performed, THEN subscription modal appears with no-pressure tone
GIVEN modal closed, WHEN dismissed, THEN user can continue with existing data (graceful downgrade behavior)
GIVEN swipe gesture, WHEN performed, THEN haptic feedback triggered
GIVEN biometric auth, WHEN available, THEN offered as login option
GIVEN offline mode, WHEN no network, THEN cached data shown with sync indicator
GIVEN touch targets, WHEN measured, THEN minimum 44x44pt on all interactive elements

accessibilityCompliance.screenReaderSupport: ARIA labels on all interactive elements
accessibilityCompliance.colorIndependence: status communicated via icons + text + color

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN any interactive element, WHEN focused, THEN visible focus indicator
GIVEN color-coded status, WHEN displayed, THEN accompanied by icon and/or text
GIVEN screen reader, WHEN navigating entire app, THEN all content accessible
GIVEN high contrast mode, WHEN enabled, THEN all text meets 7:1 contrast
GIVEN keyboard user, WHEN tabbing, THEN logical focus order maintained
GIVEN theme toggle, WHEN switching, THEN all colors update correctly
GIVEN any theme, WHEN inspected, THEN no red colors present
GIVEN light mode, WHEN background checked, THEN never stark white
GIVEN theme preference, WHEN app reloads, THEN persisted selection applies

errorStates.description: All error states use encouraging, non-judgmental language

networkError.title: Taking a moment to reconnect
networkError.message: We're having trouble reaching our servers. Your work is safe!

authError.title: Let's try that again
authError.message: Something didn't match. No worries, it happens!

processingError.title: Hmm, that didn't work
processingError.message: We couldn't process that file. Maybe try a different format?

acceptanceTests.test: GIVEN any error, WHEN message displayed, THEN uses friendly language
GIVEN any error, WHEN inspected, THEN no red colors used
GIVEN error message, WHEN checked, THEN forbidden words not present
GIVEN locale change, WHEN app reloads, THEN all text translated
GIVEN RTL language, WHEN active, THEN layout mirrors correctly
GIVEN date display, WHEN rendered, THEN follows locale format
GIVEN any animation, WHEN measured, THEN maintains 60fps
GIVEN prefers-reduced-motion, WHEN set, THEN animations disabled
GIVEN completion animation, WHEN triggered, THEN satisfying and celebratory

propertyTests.colorCompliance: Property 2: No red or stark white in any rendered element
propertyTests.languageCompliance: Property 4: No forbidden words in any UI text
propertyTests.accessibilityCompliance: All interactive elements have ARIA support
